name: No Man Is An Island (The Bearded Men)
name_original: No Man Is An Island (The Bearded Men)
description: You wash up on a small deserted isle, with naught but the clothes on your back and a lone coconut tree. You can see ships off in the distance but it’s clear that no one can see you due to the size of your spit of land. So you must do the only logical thing you can do. Make your tiny sand bank into a mighty island and get rescued.
